body: @champioj @cznic @ianlancetaylor To be clear: I know what all you mean. No need to overemphasize that you cannot turn a sentence around. The problem is simply that I got a false impression from the tour and its example code. A tour should not lead to any confusion. One should for instance not check if a slice is `nil` to find out if it is empty or has a capacity of 0. And that is something that is implicitly suggested by the example code. You could at least get the idea.
